query.statement:
SELECT E.SV_STUS AS SV_STUS ,F.CTEXT2 AS STUSTEXT ,E.PSPID AS PSPID ,E.HOGI AS HOGI ,E.ART AS ART ,E.ARTTEXT AS ARTTEXT ,E.SEQ AS SEQ ,E.CMNTCHK AS CMNTCHK ,E.EXEMPTION AS EXEMPTION ,E.PARQDT AS PARQDT ,E.PACFDT AS PACFDT ,E.PAPRDT AS PAPRDT ,E.SPEC AS SPEC ,E.LOCATION AS LOCATION ,E.PAREADY AS PAREADY ,E.MATNR AS MATNR ,E.MAKTX AS MAKTX ,E.TEMNO AS TEMNO ,E.NAMET AS TEMNONM ,E.LIFNR AS LIFNR ,E.NAME1 AS LIFNRNM ,E.PRUEFLOS AS PRUEFLOS ,E.PAPRIDTX AS PAPRIDTX ,E.DSKURZTEXT AS DSKURZTEXT ,E.DSKATALOGART AS DSKATALOGART ,E.DSCODEGRUPPE AS DSCODEGRUPPE ,E.DSCODE AS DSCODE ,E.VDATUM AS VDATUM ,E.WERKS AS WERKS ,'' AS EXAMREQUEST ,E.CHECK AS CHECK FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN (VDATUM='' OR VDATUM='00000000') AND (PRUEFLOS ='' OR PRUEFLOS='000000000000') AND (PACFDT='' OR PACFDT='00000000') THEN '2' WHEN (VDATUM='' OR VDATUM='00000000') AND (PRUEFLOS ='' OR PRUEFLOS='000000000000') AND (PACFDT<>'00000000' AND PACFDT>'') THEN '3' WHEN (VDATUM='' OR VDATUM='00000000') AND PRUEFLOS>'000000000000' THEN '4' WHEN (VDATUM <> '00000000' AND VDATUM>'') THEN '5' ELSE '1' END AS SV_STUS ,PSPID ,HOGI ,ART ,CASE ART WHEN '8950' THEN '중간' WHEN '8960' THEN '완성' END AS ARTTEXT ,SEQ ,CMNTCHK ,EXEMPTION ,PARQDT ,PACFDT ,PAPRDT ,A.SPEC ,LOCATION ,PAREADY ,A.MATNR ,A.MAKTX ,A.TEMNO ,B.NAMET ,A.LIFNR ,C.NAME1 ,PRUEFLOS ,PAPRIDTX ,DSKURZTEXT ,DSKATALOGART ,DSCODEGRUPPE ,DSCODE ,VDATUM ,WERKS ,CASE WHEN PARQDT > '' THEN '1' ELSE '' END AS CHECK FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT019 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0002 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.TEMNO = B.TEMNO AND B.DELEF <> 'X' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.LIFNR = C.LIFNR WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PSPID = #POSID# AND A.HOGI = #HNO# AND A.VDATUM > '' AND A.VDATUM <> '00000000'
) AS E ,SAPHEE.ZLCODE AS F WHERE F.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND F.CODE1 = 'QMII' AND E.SV_STUS = F.CODE2 AND F.LANG = #G_LANG# WITH UR
